text: Wimbledon is a 2004 British romantic comedy-drama movie. It was directed by Richard Loncraine. It stars Paul Bettany as Peter Colt and Kirsten Dunst as Lizzie Bradbury. They are tennis players who meet at the Wimbledon Championships at which they are both competing. Sam Neill plays Lizzie's father Dennis Bradbury. == Other websites == * * * Category:2004 romantic comedy movies Category:2004 comedy-drama movies Category:2004 romantic drama movies Category:British comedy-drama movies Category:British romantic comedy movies Category:British romantic drama movies Category:2000s English-language movies Category:Movies set in London
title: Wimbledon (movie)
